    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Colonial America &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Oct 21, 2015
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/colonialamerica
     </span>
     <span class="printguideurl" style="padding:0px 10px 0px 10px;">

            <div id="lgsearch_label" class="lgsearch_item">
             &nbsp;&nbsp;Search:&nbsp;
            </div>
           </td>
           <td valign="middle">

             <input type="text" class="searchField" name="searchs" id="searchs" onkeypress="return handleEnterSearch(event,'homesearch','customSearch()');" />

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17028791">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17028791">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17028791">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17028791">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17028791" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17028793">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17028793">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17028793">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I obtain primary sources on Colonial America?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17028793">
          <div id="boxatt17028793" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20075950">
              <a id="link_20075950" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://eebo.chadwyck.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/home" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20075950,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Colonial America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20075950}); ">
               EEBO: Early English Books Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (available by library subscription)
               <br />
               Contains digital facsimiles of virtually every work printed in England, Ireland, Scotland, Wales and British North America and works in English printed elsewhere from 1473-1700.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24925534">
              <a id="link_24925534" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://infotrac.galegroup.com/itweb/mul_coll?db=ECCO" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24925534,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Colonial America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717133}); ">
               Eighteenth Century Collections Online (ECCO)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Over 180,000 titles (200,000 volumes) comprising books, pamphlets, essays, broadsides and more based on the English Short Title Catalogue Works published in the UK during the 18th century plus thousands from elsewhere. Content covers critical information in the fields of history, literature, religion, law, fine arts, science and more. Primarily in English but also includes other languages.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20075970">
              <a id="link_20075970" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.accessible.com/accessible/preLog" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20075970,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Colonial America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344564}); ">
               Pennsylvania Gazette
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (library subscription)
               <br />
               Has been nicknamed "The New York Times of the 18th century," and covers a broad range of topics in the period 1728-1800.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20075983">
              <a id="link_20075983" href="http://memory.loc.gov/ammem/index.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20075983,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Colonial America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20075983}); ">
               American Memory Project
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The Library of Congress's American Memory Project includes numerous online collections from the colonial era. Unfortunately, the database emphasizes post-1763.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17028794">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17028794">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17028794">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           What about journals and books that may contain, or reference, primary documents?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17028794">
          <div id="boxatt17028794" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20481215">
              <a id="link_20481215" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20481215,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Colonial America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for American history. Some full text. Also links to full text in other databases.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24925528">
              <a id="link_24925528" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24925528,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Colonial America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24925801">
              <a id="link_24925801" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24925801,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Colonial America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24925801}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Useful in particular for searching on pre-1923 documents for which the full text is likely available.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24925803">
              <a id="link_24925803" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24925803,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Colonial America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Google Books is a rich source of full-text documents (books and other materials) published prior to 1923 that are now in the public domain.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4630117" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17028798">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17028798">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17028798">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How about citing source?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17028798">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources in the Chicago style, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           . For a more complete guide to the Chicago style, visit Purdue University's
           <em>
            <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/717/01/">
             Online Writing Lab
            </a>
           </em>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           . Here is a user
           <a href="https://www.zotero.org/support/">
            guide
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17028798" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
